## Overview
Brief description of the module, its responsibilities, and its role in the overall system.

## Scope
- core responsibilities

## Design / Architecture
- Description
- Key decisions
- Relevant control flow

## Questions
- Pending decisions
- Trade-offs to consider
- Alternatives evaluated
